it.uniroma1.di.simulejos.math

Class Vector2

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniroma1.di.simulejos.math.Vector2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Vector2
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    Represents a pair of real values, or a point in the two-dimensional plane. Object of the Vector2 class are immutable.
    Author:
    Alberto La Rocca
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • toArray

        public double[] toArray()
        Returns a new array containing two double values, the two components of this vector. Modification to the array will not have any effect on this vector.
        Returns:
        A new array of double containing the two components of this vector.

      • toHomogeneous

        public Vector3 toHomogeneous()
        Converts this 2D standard vector into a 2D homogeneous vector represented by a Vector3 object with three components: X, Y and the W homogeneous coordinate. This Vector2 object is not modified, a new Vector3 is created.
        Returns:
        A new Vector3 object representing a 2D vector in homogeneous coordinates.

      • floorX

        public Vector2 floorX(double min)
        Floors the X component of this vector to the specified value. This vector is not modified, a new Vector2 is created and returned instead.
